info.task: navigate forwards to partially checked checkbox
info.title: Navigate forwards to a partially checked checkbox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the partially checked state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the checkbox.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the partially checked state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the checkbox.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: State of the checkbox (partially checked) is conveyed
